title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)
OB: When updating the checked state of the table, it takes a long time (30 seconds in my case). The busy cursor should be shown during this process.
EB: The software should use a busy cursor to indicate that it is actively updating the checked state of the table.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. In a workspace with many projects, select 'Export Zip'. 2. Select all projects. 3. Choose some file types. 4. Press 'OK'.
